content: My toddler cannot get enough of this app. He absolutely loves playing the Letter Quiz: Alphabet Aquarium games. Everyday after daycare he comes home and begs to use our tablet to play Alphabet Aquarium.   My wife and I always say yes because the games are quite educational. Not only are the games educational, but they keep him quite for an hour or so each night. This could not be more of a blessing. The kid typically is bouncing off the walls.   Also, we recently met with his day care instructor. The day care is somewhat of a preschool for three years olds as well. She said that the last few months he has really began to get ahead of the class, especially with his reading abilities and alphabet. We grabbed Letter Quiz: Alphabet Aquarium a few months back. This was not a coincidence; this app does help kids learn. If you have a toddler, I highly recommend Letter Quiz: Alphabet Aquarium.

A Priceless Learning tool For Children! Simple to use & Deeply Engaging! A ...	PERFECT!! Simple to use & Deeply Engaging! This is a Fantastic investment for all parents!  The platform is simple to follow for young learners with Vivid, eye-catching graphics and a wide variety of learning games.  The Sounds of Happy children’s voices will grab your child’s attention right from the start making it deeply engaging and a lot of fun for toddlers and young children alike.  It will help you prepare your child for preschool as it teaches all the basic fundamentals of early childhood education.  They think they’re just playing games!  They will have a blast as they explore matching letters with words using flashcards, connect the dots using ABC’s, Sequencing ABC’s with colorful jellyfish, Matching objects with letters and learning upper and lower case letters and so much more!  We love the apps from 22learn!  I have quite the collection both for my Autistic Daughter and for my 3 year old nephew!  These apps are Always Enriching & Engaging. Bring some FUN into your Childs World with 22learn!

Great application for any parent looking for something to teach their child letters and alphabet. I really appreciate that each game has several levels of difficulty so that a child can progress through different levels with practice. I recommend this to all moms and dads who want their preschooler to have a bit of fun while learning. It has a very pleasing design and many educational games.

I usually have to babysit kids (mostly my cousin) sometimes and they can get pretty bored at times. Thankfully I have a bunch of apps on my phone that I got specifically to prevent this from happening. This app if by far one of the coolest ones I have. This app will allow a kid to learn the alphabet in a fun and interactive way. The app is very cool and you'll see how well it works when your kids are saying the alphabet soon after playing around with this app.  Overall, Great app with a great interface and content. Fun and educational is what this app is.

I was looking for a game which is educational as well as fun. I finally found one. It takes lot of time for me to teach my son about letters. This application made that teaching much simpler. Saved me so much time! And my son loves to sing the alphabet song within the app. Also, it is great that there are multiple objects for each letter, so it enhanced my son's vocabulary as his native language is not English.

My young nephew that is in the big K this year should have a fair shot at succeeding with understanding. This game seems great and may just be the edge he needs for this fair shot. He seems to have been kept rather focused and interested on playing the game educational or not he does have a fairly short attention span always looking for the next thing to do but when it comes to certain things he manages not to get bored and so far this seems like one of the things.

My little cousins love this game. This game does a great job with teaching the alphabet and my little cousins loves showing me the games and all the things they are learning. This application is engaging, well designed and educational all at the same time. The application is filled with great graphics, and fun sounds that keep my little cousins begging me to play more. Highly Recommended for anyone with kids.
Greatly designed app with colorful and engaging graphics and sounds. My daughter truly loves this game and learns each time. Truly glad I found this app. Definitely recommend! A++
